concept.title: Partition Strategy
concept.shortdesc: The partition strategy determines how to write data to Kafka partitions. You can use a partition strategy for balance the load or to write data semantically.

conbody.p:
Kafka Producer destinationpartition strategyKafka Producer destinationpartition expressionpartition strategyKafka Producerpartition expressionKafka ProducerThe Kafka Producer provides the following partition strategies:
Round-Robin Writes each record to different partition using a cyclical order. Use for load balancing.
Random Writes each record to a different partition using a random order. Use for load balancing.
Expression Writes each record to a partition based on the results of the partition expression. Use to perform semantic partitioning. When you configure the partition expression, define the expression to evaluate to the partition where you want each record written. For example, the following expression writes records to partitions based on the value in the Age field:${record:value('/Age')<21 ? 0 : 1}
